about.description: I would like to introduce me. My name is Luan Patrik, I'm 18 years old and I've been studying web development for about 2 years. I am a motivated young man who is looking for his first professional opportunity. I have a determined spirit and a desire to learn. Although I am still at the beginning of my career, I have a solid knowledge base acquired during my studies in HTML, JavaScript, CSS, Tailwind, React, Next.js and APIs. I have the ability to work in a team and a positive attitude. I am ready to face challenges that arise and adapt quickly to new situations.
about.author: Sincerely, Luan Patrik
